column1: Little Goat Diner////Now lets get to the sides.  The fries were "smoked" with a nacho cheese seasoning.  Where?  No smoke
column2: no nacho seasoning.  Just mediocre fries. Room temperature and greasy
column3: not light and crisp.  Like the oil wasn't hot enough when they were fried
column4: so they got saturated with oil.   McDonalds fries taste better.  Seriously
